name: Cyberpunk Capital: The Clone Wars
description:
This game is a companion piece to chapter 3 of Cyberpunk Capital.  How does the means of circulation change?

If you haven't been reading it, perebite has been acting as Johnny Silverhand reading Marx' Capital Volume 1. In this section, Johnny has been describing the flow of means of circulation as the march of Gold Clones, changing orphaned, unwanted commodities into sexkittens who are desired and used up by their owners... 

By meeting their f*cklimits. 

The true Marxian meanings:

Number of Orphans = number of commodities

Average F*cklimit = average price

Average Owner Switch Speed = average turnover velocity

It all makes a lot more sense if you check out Cyberpunk Capital.

https://www.instagram.com/cyberpunk.capital/

https://twitter.com/cyberpunkapital

music is the clones ~ lofi - closed on Sundays
